Job.Title: Director
Job.Description: She will direct the scenes. One Director can film at most 3 scenes per week.

GainTrait.Text: ${name} has directed so many movies, she is now an accomplished Director.

LoseTrait.Text: Having to use her authority as a Director, ${name} has become less Meek.

Message.Name: no-crew
Message.Text: There was no crew to film the scene, so ${name} took the day off.

Message.Name: no-actress
Message.Text: There were no actresses to film, so ${name} took the day off.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to work as a Director today.

Message.Name: work
Message.Text: ${name} directed the filming of some scenes today.

Message.Name: work.perfect
Message.Text: ${name} is an excellent Director. Not only is she a great cinematographer, but she also helped the actress improve her performance.

Message.Name: work.good
Message.Text: ${name} is quite good as a Director.

Message.Name: work.ok
Message.Text: ${name} did an ok job directing scenes today.

Message.Name: work.worst
Message.Text: ${name} was supposed to be directing some scenes today, but really, all she did was confuse the studio crew with contradictory instructions.
